triples.name: Recommender system
triples.relevance: The core problem domain that the survey addresses, examining how RS work and improve them.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The primary technique surveyed for addressing the sequential decision-making nature of recommendation problems.

triples.name: Markov decision process
triples.relevance: The mathematical framework used to formulate the recommendation problem as a sequential decision problem.

triples.name: Collaborative filtering
triples.relevance: A traditional recommendation method that the survey contrasts with RL-based approaches.

triples.name: Content-based filtering
triples.relevance: Another traditional recommendation method that the survey compares with RL-based approaches.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The advanced RL variant that made practical application to recommendation systems feasible by handling large state and action spaces.
